name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 63: The Gun Shooting 2
overview: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 63 - The Gun Shooting 2 is a gun game that features 3 game modes: - Story Mode: Can be played by 1 or 2 players at the same time, and features 30 stages. - Score Attack Mode: Beat the score to win. Unlockable playing the story mode - Party Mode: Up to 4 players can compete to know which one achieve the bigger score. The game features also an unlockable picture gallery of the Story part.
